name: Sonar Pulse
description:
Sonar Pulse is a casual arcade defence game that merges strategy with timing to create a new level of finger-biting action. Protect your territory by using your sonar pulse to intercept and destroy all submarines.

A game made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2013. The jamming theme was the sound of a heartbeat.

Credits :
